summary: In the final days of WW2, in a M.A.S.H. unit in Burma, a severely wounded corporal watches in dismay as fellow soldiers pack-up to return home but a caring nurse and five remaining soldiers bring him solace.
cast: Ronald Reagan|Patricia Neal|Richard Todd|Anthony Nicholls|Howard Marion-Crawford|Ralph Michael|John Sherman|Alfie Bass|Orlando Martins|Robert Douglas|Clive Dunn|John Gregson|Sam Kydd|Pamela van Dale|Ben Williams
title: Alma en tinieblas
